TopicTitle: Do control windglets coordinable with secondary attached parts

Articles.Content:
Hello, today I thought that winglets could be attached and move mini-jet engines (basic engines), while I was seeing that these winglets moves when you can change the direction of the aircraft or rocket.

However, after a test, I saw that can not move attached parts, ie, if you have a part connected directly with a control winglet and nothing more, this should move when the winglet moves, but in the practise does not move with these connected winglets, and stay static in allineation with the vehicle body.

 

This is unrealistic and limite the mechanics of vehicles of the game.

I suggest do connected parts with mobile parts, move when such mobile parts moves. This could be very useful to obtain complex composed control winglets and more simple vertical launching aircrafts.

 

In summary: I suggest do to winglets capable to move connected parts when these move.

Edited April 8, 2016 by Angeltxilon
